description: This file defines a React functional component 'DashboardOverview' that displays an overview dashboard with metrics and quick links. It fetches system metrics from an API, handles loading and error states, and renders UI elements accordingly.

methods.name: DashboardOverview()
methods.description: React functional component that displays an overview dashboard with metrics and quick links, manages loading, error, and data states with hooks, and fetches data asynchronously on component mount.
